steps.title: A â€œDiscord kittenâ€ is someone in a sugar baby relationship on Discord.
steps.content: A â€œDiscord kittenâ€ is someone in a sugar baby relationship on Discord. â€œDiscordâ€ refers to a downloadable social platform where users can join servers and chat with other users, while â€œkittenâ€ represents young women on the platform. People have used the term both ironically and seriously since the mid-to-late 2010s, when the phrase first came to exist. â€œDiscord Kittenâ€ really earned its spot within internet vernacular when one netizen coined the joke â€œDaddy will be back on Discord soon, Kitten.â€ [1] X Research source A sugar baby is an individual who gets paid in some way to be in a relationship with someone else, sometimes to a sexual degree. Ultimately, the expectations of a sugar baby relationship depend on the individuals involved, so itâ€™s important for both parties to be really clear about what they want. [2] X Research source While sugar baby relationships can be safe if both parties set clear boundaries, the partnership can easily become unhealthy and rooted in a sense of obligation. Selling oneâ€™s services as a sugar baby can also have long-term effects on a personâ€™s sense of self-worth, and can cause them to be unfairly judged by people they know. [3] X Research source The term â€œDiscord kittenâ€ is often associated with underaged participants, according to online users. [4] X Research source Because these arrangements are essentially transactional relationships, it isnâ€™t healthy or safe for an underaged individual to be a part of one. â€œE-kittenâ€ is another word for â€œDiscord kitten.â€ [5] X Research source The term Discord kitten is most associated with women, but anyone can theoretically be one.

steps.title: The term â€œDiscord kittenâ€ originated in 2016 but became well-known later.
steps.content: The term â€œDiscord kittenâ€ originated in 2016 but became well-known later. At the very end of 2016, user SlaytypeDA on Twitter/X tweeted â€œjoin the discord ğŸ˜ƒ kitten,â€ which didnâ€™t gain much traction at the time. In 2017 and 2018, the term gained a wider spread on Reddit from users both advertising themselves as â€œkittensâ€ and those criticizing the use of the word in casual conversation. [6] X Research source Through various posts and memes on Twitter/X, the term â€œkittenâ€ and â€œDiscord kittenâ€ continued to grow in terms of meme status.

steps.title: A Discord kitten relationship is like an online sugar baby relationship.
steps.content: A Discord kitten relationship is like an online sugar baby relationship. Self-proclaimed â€œdiscord kittensâ€ will advertise a little bit of information about themselves and their interests, and may offer to reach out to certain users who reply to their post. These relationships may operate like a standard sugar daddy/sugar baby relationship, where the sugar â€œdaddyâ€ gives the sugar â€œbabyâ€ gifts as a sort of payment for the time they spend together. Given how meme-centric the term â€œDiscord kittenâ€ is, itâ€™s hard to say how serious/unserious an actual Discord kitten relationship would be. Some people claim (often in a joking way) that Discord kittens often get Nitro (Discordâ€™s premium membership) from their sugar parent. Discord Nitro membership has two tiers (Nitro Basic and Nitro), both of which allow users to send larger files over the platform, use a wider range of emojis, and apply animated â€œSuper Reactionsâ€ to messages. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Create a kitten profile for yourself if youâ€™re 18 or older.
steps.content: Create a kitten profile for yourself if youâ€™re 18 or older. If youâ€™re already on Discord, it might help to make an entirely new profile and persona for yourself thatâ€™s separate from your old account. Jazz up your profile with aesthetic templates , and feel free to use plenty of cute emojis and kaomojis to really make yourself stand out. Discord kitten relationships are conducted online, so your persona will be a big part of the relationship. Discord kittens are often associated with cutesy emojis like UwU (closed eyes with a cat mouth). Most people offering themselves as Discord daddies will likely be over 18, so itâ€™s very important that you are 18 or older yourself before becoming a Discord kitten.

steps.title: Introduce yourself to potential companions.
steps.content: Introduce yourself to potential companions. One of the first notable Discord kitten introduction posts was put in the r/GamerPals Reddit , so that could be a good starting point. If youâ€™re looking for a more obvious sugar parent arrangement, check out /rSugarDatingForum . Apps like Seeking Arrangements are also good if youâ€™re looking for a sugar parent online. Look for public Discord servers that cater to Discord kittens and potential companions, like Kitten .

steps.title: Set boundaries in your relationship and stand by them.
steps.content: Set boundaries in your relationship and stand by them. In any type of sugar baby relationship, itâ€™s important to be crystal-clear about what is and isnâ€™t expected within the relationship. [8] X Research source Donâ€™t agree to any conditions that you arenâ€™t completely comfortable with, and donâ€™t be afraid to advocate for yourself if your Discord daddy tries to manipulate you into doing something out of your comfort zone. [9] X Research source As a general rule of thumb, never give out any personal information to people you donâ€™t know well, even if theyâ€™re offering to give you gifts or buy you things. If you ever feel uncomfortable with an online interaction, donâ€™t be afraid to cut tiesâ€”you should never feel forced into an unhappy (or even unsafe) situation for someone elseâ€™s enjoyment. Like any sugar baby relationship, the relationship between a Discord kitten and daddy doesnâ€™t have to be unhealthy if clear boundaries are set and respected. However, these relationships can quickly get toxic if the Discord daddy tries to guilt the kitten into doing or sending things out of a financial obligation. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Discord Nitro
steps.content: Discord Nitro Discord Nitro is Discordâ€™s premium membership option that offers bonus features to users, like using extra emojis, sending Super Reactions, and sending larger files across the platform. [11] X Research source

steps.title: E-girl
steps.content: E-girl E-girl is short for â€œelectronic girl,â€ and refers to women who subscribe to a specific type of aesthetic thatâ€™s geared to different types of subcultures, including cosplay (dressing up as fictional characters), K-Pop (Korean pop music), and more. The term is often used in meme culture, and is sometimes used in conjunction with the term â€œDiscord kitten.â€ [12] X Research source E-boy is the male counterpart of e-girl.

steps.title: Sugar baby
steps.content: Sugar baby A person who receives money and gifts from a sugar parent (typically referred to as a sugar daddy or sugar mommy/momma) in exchange for spending time together. Specific sugar baby/sugar parent arrangements depend on the individual.

steps.title: Sugar daddy/momma
steps.content: Sugar daddy/momma A sugar daddy or sugar mommy/momma is a person who pays and gives gifts to someone for their companionship.
